text: Loop invariants are a way to reason of what your for loops does. I think most people innately know about them, but making them explicit is good for educational purpose as well as if you need to write proofs. I say use whatever is necessary and comfortable.

elements.text: Loop invariants are a way to reason of what your for loops does. I think most people innately know about them, but making them explicit is good for educational purpose as well as if you need to write proofs. I say use whatever is necessary and comfortable.

text:
For instance, when teaching/learning algorithms, it is necessary to understand what are the invariants to apply induction or what not.

Whether one uses them in normal day to day programming is up to them.
